service.name: productImageFileScaleInAllSize
service.description: Scales a product image file according to size types in product config ImageProperties.xml and using filename formats from catalog.properties

attribute.name: imageOrigPath
attribute.description: Full path of original image in filesystem as input (alternative to imageOrigUrl; if neither specified, auto-determines an original filename under imageServerPath); also supports component:// and file:// prefixes

attribute.name: imageOrigUrl
attribute.description: URL of image relative to server root of original image in filesystem as input; WARN: 2017-07-04: MUST start with imageUrlPrefix else error; no other mount-points supported (alternative to imageOrigPath; if neither specified, auto-determines an original filename under imageServerPath)

attribute.name: imageOrigFn
attribute.description: Original filename (no directories) of the image - required only if neither imageOrigPath nor imageOrigUrl specified

attribute.name: imageOrigFnFmt
attribute.description: Image filename format string for original only, relative to imageServerPath/imageUrlPrefix, no extension; only useful if copyOrig==true or if imageOrigPath/imageOrigUrl are omitted (default: same as imageFnFmt)

attribute.name: imageServerPath
attribute.description: Full filesystem path of base server image, parameterized with ${tenantId} (default: uses image.server.path / catalog.properties); also supports component:// and file:// prefixes

attribute.name: imageUrlPrefix
attribute.description: URL prefix for generated images, parameterized with ${tenantId} (default: uses image.url.prefix / catalog.properties)

attribute.name: imageFnFmt
attribute.description: Image filename format string, relative to imageServerPath/imageUrlPrefix, no extension, parameterized with ${sizetype} (or ${type}) and product fields (default: uses image.filename.format OR image.filename.additionalviewsize.format / catalog.properties)

attribute.name: imagePathArgs
attribute.description: Additional args for parameterized paths

attribute.name: imageProfile
attribute.description: Image profile, now generally required (name or org.ofbiz.common.image.ImageProfile)

attribute.name: imagePropXmlPath
attribute.description: Path to ImageProperties.xml file containing size types, from ofbiz home root

attribute.name: sizeTypeList
attribute.description: List of size types to generate and return (default: all types in file)

attribute.name: copyOrig
attribute.description: If true, also creates copy of the original under the size type "original" (default: false)

attribute.name: deleteOld
attribute.description: [TODO: NOT IMPLEMENTED] If true, also deletes old files in target directory (default: false)

attribute.name: productId
attribute.description: productId

attribute.name: viewType
attribute.description: main|additional

attribute.name: viewNumber
attribute.description: For additional (String or Integer)

attribute.name: scalingOptions
attribute.description: Scaling options, notably the entry: scalerName (algorithm or library name)

attribute.name: imageUrlMap
attribute.description: Map of size types to URLs (relative to server root, with imageUrlPrefix); if copyOrig==true, also contains "original" (UNLESS found to already exist / same as input) NOTE: Unlike stock ofbiz functions, this returns ALL generated. Use productSizeTypeList to iterate the common size types.

attribute.name: productSizeTypeList
attribute.description: The list of typical product size types: [small, medium, large, detail]

attribute.name: bufferedImage
attribute.description: Original image contents, for reuse

service.name: productImageAutoRescale
service.description: Automatically rescales one or more product images for a product (does NOT consult parent/virtual products)

attribute.name: allImages
attribute.description: If true, automatically tries to apply to all the known associated images or all productContentTypeId

attribute.name: productContentTypeId
attribute.description: productContentTypeId of the ProductContent for the image - for main product image use ORIGINAL_IMAGE_URL, otherwise ADDITIONAL_IMAGE_x - NOTE: for products with no ORIGINAL_IMAGE_URL, DETAIL_IMAGE_URL is consulted instead

attribute.name: productContentTypeIdList
attribute.description: List of productContentTypeId of the ProductContent for the image - for main product image use ORIGINAL_IMAGE_URL, otherwise ADDITIONAL_IMAGE_x - NOTE: for products with no ORIGINAL_IMAGE_URL, DETAIL_IMAGE_URL is consulted instead

attribute.name: contentId
attribute.description: contentId of the ProductContent for the image [either contentId or productContentTypeId must be set]

attribute.name: contentIdList
attribute.description: List of contentId of the ProductContent for the image [either contentId or productContentTypeId must be set]

attribute.name: sizeTypeList
attribute.description: Optional list of size dimension names to restrict resizing to (e.g.: 320x240, small); unlisted are left unchanged

attribute.name: createSizeTypeContent
attribute.description: If true (default), ProductContent/DataResource records are added to products for size types not previously defined

attribute.name: recreateExisting
attribute.description: If false (default), existing files for the size types are ignored and not regenerated; if true, all or give size types are always regenerated (slow)

attribute.name: nonFatal
attribute.description: If true, runs in separate transaction and returns failure on image resize fail; if false, runs in current transaction and returns error on on image resize fail

service.name: productImageAutoRescaleProducts
service.description: Automatically rescales one or more product images for multiple or all products (does NOT consult parent/virtual products)

attribute.name: products
attribute.description: List of product values or IDs or EntityListIterator

attribute.name: productIdList
attribute.description: List of product IDs (alias for "products", same functionality, for easier use with runService UI)

attribute.name: allProducts
attribute.description: If true, queries all products in the system instead of passing by list

attribute.name: allImages
attribute.description: (For each image) If true, automatically tries to apply to the known associated image types

attribute.name: productContentTypeId
attribute.description: (For each image) productContentTypeId of the ProductContent for the image - for main product image use ORIGINAL_IMAGE_URL, otherwise ADDITIONAL_IMAGE_x - NOTE: for products with no ORIGINAL_IMAGE_URL, DETAIL_IMAGE_URL is consulted instead

attribute.name: productContentTypeIdList
attribute.description: (For each image) List of productContentTypeId of the ProductContent for the image - for main product image use ORIGINAL_IMAGE_URL, otherwise ADDITIONAL_IMAGE_x - NOTE: for products with no ORIGINAL_IMAGE_URL, DETAIL_IMAGE_URL is consulted instead

attribute.name: sizeTypeList
attribute.description: (For each image) Optional list of size dimension names to restrict resizing to (e.g.: 320x240, small); unlisted are left unchanged

attribute.name: createSizeTypeContent
attribute.description: If true (default), ProductContent/DataResource records are added to products for size types not previously defined

attribute.name: recreateExisting
attribute.description: If false (default), existing files for the size types are ignored and not regenerated; if true, all or give size types are always regenerated (slow)

attribute.name: sepProductTrans
attribute.description: NOTE: For safety this is left true by default, but in addition each image may also get a separate transaction through nonFatal (TODO: clarify)

service.name: productImageAutoRescaleAll
service.description: Automatically rescales one or more product images for multiple or all products (does NOT consult parent/virtual products)
